doc:
Stephen Marcus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Marcus 0 Stephen Marcus (born Stephen Mark Scott; 18 June 1962) is a British actor, best known for his role as Nick the Greek in the film Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels. Stephen_Marcus ( born Stephen_Mark_Scott ; 18_June_1962 ) is a_British_actor , best_known for his_role as Nick the_Greek in the_film_Lock , Stock and Two_Smoking_Barrels .
